GET /api/v1/project: Verify that an array of Projects is returned when they exist/created
POST /api/v1/project: Verify that a Project can be saved when using only mandatory parameters
PUT /api/v1/project: Verify that a Project can be updated using only mandatory parameters
DELETE /api/v1/project: Verify that a Project can be deleted

GET /api/v1/project: Verify that an unauthorized error is returned when using an invalid token
POST /api/v1/project: Verify that a Project can be saved when using all accepted parameters
PUT /api/v1/project: Verify that a Project can be updated successfully with all accepted parameters
DELETE /api/v1/project: Verify that an error is returned when sending invalid data type for "projectId" parameter

POST /api/v1/project: Verify that a Project can not be saved when "customerId" is missing
PUT /api/v1/project: Verify that a Project cannot be updated without the "projectId" parameter
DELETE /api/v1/project: Verify that an error is returned when sending "projectId" parameter that do not exist

POST /api/v1/project: Verify that a Project can not be saved when "name" is missing
PUT /api/v1/project: Verify that a Project cannot be updated without the "customerId" parameter

POST /api/v1/project: Verify that a Project can not be saved when "adminIds" is missing
PUT /api/v1/project: Verify that a Project cannot be updated without the "name" parameter

POST /api/v1/project: Verify that an error is returned when trying to save a Project with the same "customerId" and "name" parameters
PUT /api/v1/project: Verify that a Project cannot be updated without the "description" parameter

POST /api/v1/project: Verify that an error is returned when sending invalid data type for "customerId" parameter
PUT /api/v1/project: Verify that a Project cannot be updated without the "adminIds" parameter

POST /api/v1/project: Verify that an error is returned when sending invalid data type for "adminIds" parameter
PUT /api/v1/project: Verify that an error is returned when sending invalid data type for "projectId" parameter

POST /api/v1/project: Verify that an error is returned when save with  random "customerId" parameter
PUT /api/v1/project: Verify that an error is returned when sending invalid data type for "customerId" parameter

POST /api/v1/project: Verify that an error is returned when save with  random "adminId" parameter
PUT /api/v1/project: Verify that an error is returned when sending invalid data type for "adminIds" parameter
